## Description {#details}

Base class for user error types.

Users should declare their error types like:

class MyError : public <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/errorinfo">ErrorInfo&lt;MyError&gt;</a> &#123; .... &#125;;

This class provides an implementation of the ErrorInfoBase::kind method, which is used by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> RTTI system.

Definition at line 355 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h">Error.h</a>.
